3. Kimberly Goodman, Single Member District C

Kimberly Goodman, Single Member District C
==========================================

The Honorable Kimberly Goodman was elected to the Buda City Council in December 2025 and was sworn in as the Single Member District C representative on January 20, 2026.

Goodman has lived in Buda for more than 20 years and has served on various boards and committees during that time. She has been a board member of the Hays CISD Council of PTAs, a former Buda Lions Club member, and served on the Buda Bonds Oversight Committee and Hotel Occupancy Tax Grant Committee for the City of Buda. Goodman is currently the President of the Cullen Country Homeowner’s Association and the Vice President of the Buda Citizens’ Police Academy Alumni Association. Additionally, she is a graduate of the Buda Citizens’ Academy (2022) and the Buda Citizens’ Police Academy (2023).

Goodman has been a nurse for more than 24 years with a background in Emergency Room Nursing. She is currently the Chief Nurse Executive for Austin State Hospital. She is a former Clinical Instructor with Concordia and taught at Seton Hays for more than 5 years. She is also the Founder and President of the Central Texas Nurse Honor Guard.

In her spare time, Goodman loves to travel and spend time with her two kids and two yorkies. She is extremely excited to serve on the Buda City Council and wants to keep our small town feel while having a voice regarding growth, traffic, water, more parks, and mental health awareness.
